name: A Worker's Guide to Espionage
description:
This game was made over a couple of days for the Organising at Work jam.

It's based on the article Basics of Organising from the IWW.

The jam still has a while to go, so I'm very open to any suggestions for changes.

CONTROLS:

AWSD to move  //  SHIFT to run

Click to interact  //  SPACE to toggle map mode

Music: The Jazz Police by The University of Warwick Big Band

If you have any comments/thoughts, feel free to get in touch via email at colestia3@gmail.com or on Twitter @colestia3. And if you like the games I'm making, please consider supporting me on Patreon!
